name: Stamp
headline: The AI Inbox
description:
Stamp is the first AI Native inbox. It's more than an email client, though -- it's like your second brain.

Stamp can respond to emails in your voice, organize your inbox to filter out the noise, keep track of action items, and automate essentially every task you're doing manually in your inbox today.

founders.name: Vin Bui, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder, CTO @ Stamp. Previously ISST @ Cornell University, SWE @ Glassdoor.

founders.name: Archit Mehta, Founder
founders.description: Stamp CEO. Previously graduated at 20, built products with 50k+ users, Software Engineer at Stripe.

[Log In](https://www.stampmail.ai/</auth>)[Sign Up](https://www.stampmail.ai/</login>)
# The AI Inbox
###### The first AI inbox custom tailored to you. Say goodbye to email overload and hello to your second brain.
Backed by
![Stamp is backed by Y Combinator.](https://www.stampmail.ai/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fyc.84d942df.png&w=256&q=75)
[Request Demo](https://www.stampmail.ai/<https:/calendly.com/4architmehta/stamp-demo>)[Get Started](https://www.stampmail.ai/</login>)
![Stamp Inbox](https://www.stampmail.ai/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fhero_img.83642f2b.png&w=3840&q=75)
![Auto-generating replies](https://www.stampmail.ai/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fcomposer.4c6de4a4.png&w=3840&q=75)
### Reply in seconds
###### Generate contextualized replies in your voice
Stamp crafts perfect replies in your personal voice and style, with global context from your mailbox.
![Auto-categorizing emails](https://www.stampmail.ai/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fcategories.376bed52.png&w=3840&q=75)
### Filter out the noise
###### Automatically organize your inbox
Stamp automatically categorizes your emails, so you can effortlessly organize your inbox and find what you need, when you need it.
![Summary and action item generation](https://www.stampmail.ai/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fsummaries.2a611bd5.png&w=3840&q=75)
### Never miss a detail
###### Summaries and action items for every thread
Stamp summarizes all email threads and automatically extracts key action items, ensuring you stay on top of critical information and never miss a deadline.
![Search your inbox](https://www.stampmail.ai/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fsearch.c707f2b2.png&w=3840&q=75)
### Find anything, instantly
###### Search for emails in plain english
Stamp's semantic search understands the meaning and context of your emails, so you can find exactly what you need, even if you don't remember exact keywords.
## What are you waiting for?
###### Take control of your email and your day.
[Request Demo](https://www.stampmail.ai/<https:/calendly.com/4architmehta/stamp-demo>)[Get Started](https://www.stampmail.ai/</login>)
![Stamp Logo](https://www.stampmail.ai/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Flogo_name.ad979d93.png&w=256&q=75)

generated_description:
### Stamp: Your Second Brain for Email

**Company Overview:**
Founded in 2024 and part of Y Combinator's Winter 2025 batch, Stamp is an exciting startup based in San Francisco. With a tiny team of just two, they aim to revolutionize how we manage our inboxes through artificial intelligence. Think of them as your second brain for email management.

**Mission:**
Stamp’s mission is simple yet ambitious: to create "The AI Inbox." It's not just another email client; it’s designed to be an intelligent assistant that helps you navigate the chaos of your inbox effortlessly.

**Core Features:**
1. **Contextual Replies:** Stamp generates replies that mirror your personal voice and tone. No more generating generic responses; this tool understands the context of your emails and responds accordingly.
  
2. **Automated Organization:** Say goodbye to email overload! The platform automatically categorizes your emails, allowing you to find what you need without sifting through endless threads.
  
3. **Action Items and Summaries:** It summarizes conversations and extracts key action items, ensuring that you never miss an important detail or deadline again.

4. **Intelligent Search:** Forget trying to remember exact keywords. With Stamp's semantic search, you can find emails using plain English, making the process intuitive and straightforward.

**Backed by Y Combinator:** As a Y Combinator startup, Stamp is not just another tech solution; it’s a part of a network that nurtures groundbreaking ideas, giving it a solid foundation to grow.

**Why Stamp Matters:**
In today's fast-paced digital landscape, managing emails can quickly become overwhelming. Stamp’s approach frees you from manual tasks, letting you focus on what really matters. By leveraging cutting-edge technologies like generative AI and machine learning, Stamp stands out as a pioneering solution for email management.

**Join the Revolution:**
If you're drowning in emails and want a smarter way to handle your inbox, it's time to give Stamp a try. You can [request a demo](https://www.stampmail.ai/<https:/calendly.com/4architmehta/stamp-demo>) or [get started](https://www.stampmail.ai/</login>) on your journey toward email enlightenment.

For more information, visit their website at [stampmail.ai](https://www.stampmail.ai/) and take control of your inbox like never before.
